data.details: Hey Ava, good afternoon. What are you up to?
Looking around the room to see what's here.

results.simulacra_profiles.sim_b797o8.last_obser: Daniel Rodriguez said to you: 'Hey Ava, good afternoon. What are you up to?'

data.outcome_description: At 04:21 PM on Thursday, May 22, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel Rodriguez spoke with Ava Sharma.

data.narrative: At 04:21 PM (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel, having just woken up, addresses Ava in her Long Island City apartment. The afternoon light streams in through the window, illuminating the organized space. He asks, "Hey Ava, good afternoon. What are you up to?"
